name: part_010
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Pre-show announcements in Japanese by Hakui Koyori and Takane Lui from Hololive 6th generation (holoX), featuring background music and promotional slides for event merchandise.
Pre-show announcements in English by IRyS and Ceres Fauna from Hololive English, covering rules for the venue and live stream audience.
Pre-show announcements in Indonesian by Kureiji Ollie, Anya Melfissa, and Pavolia Reine from Hololive Indonesia second generation.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生、秘密結社holoXの頭脳...
subtitles.english: Hololive 6th gen, the brain of Secret Society holoX...

subtitles.original: ...博衣こよりだよ！
subtitles.english: ...is Hakui Koyori!

subtitles.original: 今日は僕たちが場内アナウンスを担当します。
subtitles.english: Today, we will be in charge of the venue announcements.

subtitles.original: 今日一日、よろしくね。
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it today.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生の鷹嶺ルイです。
subtitles.english: I'm Takane Lui from Hololive 6th gen.

subtitles.original: 開演前にお客様にご案内がございます。
subtitles.english: Before the show starts, I have some announcements for our guests.

subtitles.original: まずはじめに、会場の皆様へのご案内です。
subtitles.english: First, here are some announcements for those at the venue.

subtitles.original: ロビー、客席内等ではマスクの着用が必須となります。
subtitles.english: Wearing a mask is mandatory in the lobby and audience seats.

subtitles.original: 公演中の掛け声などは、新型コロナウイルス感染予防の観点から、ご遠慮ください。
subtitles.english: Please refrain from shouting during the performance to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

subtitles.original: ぜひ、拍手やペンライトなどでの応援をお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: Instead, please support us with clapping and penlights.

subtitles.original: また、会場内では立って応援いただいても問題ございませんが、
subtitles.english: It's fine to stand while cheering in the venue,

subtitles.original: 周りのお客様のご迷惑にならないよう、ご配慮をお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: but please be considerate of the guests around you.

subtitles.original: 続いて、配信をご覧の皆様へご案内です。
subtitles.english: Next, here are some announcements for the live stream audience.

subtitles.original: 本ライブの録音、録画、ミラー配信や無断アップロードは固くお断りいたします。
subtitles.english: Recording, filming, mirroring, or unauthorized uploads of this live performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: その代わり、スクリーンショットでの撮影をしていただくことや、 SNSで感想を呟いていただくことは大歓迎なので、
subtitles.english: However, screenshots and sharing your thoughts on social media are most welcome,

subtitles.original: 皆様、ハッシュタグ「#つながるホロライブDAY1」で 感想を呟いてSNSもいっぱい盛り上げてください。
subtitles.english: so please use the hashtag #TsunagaruHololiveDay1 and liven up social media with your thoughts.

subtitles.original: 本ライブ配信ではデータ通信量が多くなることが想定されるため、 スマートフォンでご覧になる場合はWi-Fiのご利用を推奨いたします。
subtitles.english: As this live stream involves high data usage, we recommend using Wi-Fi if you are watching on a smartphone.

subtitles.original: インターネット回線の接続が不安定な場合は、 配信動画のクオリティを保証できませんので、ご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Please note that we cannot guarantee the video quality if your internet connection is unstable.

subtitles.original: また、最善の準備を行い、ライブ配信を実施いたしますが、 生配信である特性上、
subtitles.english: We will do our best to prepare for the live broadcast, but due to its live nature,

subtitles.original: 不慮の障害で一時停止や映像の乱れなどが 起こる可能性があることを、あらかじめご了承ください。
subtitles.english: please understand that unforeseen issues may cause pauses or video disruptions.

subtitles.original: それでは、開演までもうしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Now, please wait just a little longer for the show to start.

subtitles.original: Hello everyone, this is IRyS from Hololive EN Project HOPE.
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, this is IRyS from Hololive EN Project HOPE.

subtitles.original: Thank you for coming to Hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz Day 1 today.
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to Hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz Day 1 today.

subtitles.original: Similarly, I am Fauna from Hololive EN Council.
subtitles.english: Similarly, I am Fauna from Hololive EN Council.

subtitles.original: Today we will be in charge of all the announcements within the venue.
subtitles.english: Today we will be in charge of all the announcements within the venue.

subtitles.original: We hope you have an amazing time.
subtitles.english: We hope you have an amazing time.

subtitles.original: Likewise, I am Fauna from Hololive EN Council.
subtitles.english: Likewise, I am Fauna from Hololive EN Council.

subtitles.original: Before we start the show, we have some quick announcements.
subtitles.english: Before we start the show, we have some quick announcements.

subtitles.original: We would first like to address the audience here today.
subtitles.english: We would first like to address the audience here today.

subtitles.original: Masks are mandatory and must be worn in the lobby and audience seats.
subtitles.english: Masks are mandatory and must be worn in the lobby and audience seats.

subtitles.original: Please refrain from shouting during the performances in order to prevent the spread of coronavirus.
subtitles.english: Please refrain from shouting during the performances in order to prevent the spread of coronavirus.

subtitles.original: We would love it if you supported us with your hands and penlights.
subtitles.english: We would love it if you supported us with your hands and penlights.

subtitles.original: In addition, it is fine to stand up and cheer within the venue.
subtitles.english: In addition, it is fine to stand up and cheer within the venue.

subtitles.original: However, please be considerate of those around you when doing so.
subtitles.english: However, please be considerate of those around you when doing so.

subtitles.original: Next is a short reminder to all of you who will be watching the live stream.
subtitles.english: Next is a short reminder to all of you who will be watching the live stream.

subtitles.original: It is strictly prohibited to record, tape, mirror or illegally upload this live performance.
subtitles.english: It is strictly prohibited to record, tape, mirror or illegally upload this live performance.

subtitles.original: However, in return, you are definitely welcome to take screenshots and tweet about your experience on all social media platforms.
subtitles.english: However, in return, you are definitely welcome to take screenshots and tweet about your experience on all social media platforms.

subtitles.original: Please use the hashtag #TsunagaruHololiveDay1 and tweet your thoughts on social media.
subtitles.english: Please use the hashtag #TsunagaruHololiveDay1 and tweet your thoughts on social media.

subtitles.original: This live performance is expected to require a large amount of data transmission and bandwidth.
subtitles.english: This live performance is expected to require a large amount of data transmission and bandwidth.

subtitles.original: We heavily recommend that you use Wi-Fi when viewing this event on your smartphones.
subtitles.english: We heavily recommend that you use Wi-Fi when viewing this event on your smartphones.

subtitles.original: If your internet connection is unstable, we cannot guarantee the quality of the delivered video.
subtitles.english: If your internet connection is unstable, we cannot guarantee the quality of the delivered video.

subtitles.original: Although we will do our best to prepare for the live broadcasting, please keep in mind...
subtitles.english: Although we will do our best to prepare for the live broadcasting, please keep in mind...

subtitles.original: ...that due to the nature of live broadcasts, there is a possibility of pauses or disruptions in the video due to unforeseen problems.
subtitles.english: ...that due to the nature of live broadcasts, there is a possibility of pauses or disruptions in the video due to unforeseen problems.

subtitles.original: We would like you to please wait just a little longer for the show to start.
subtitles.english: We would like you to please wait just a little longer for the show to start.

subtitles.original: Halo semuanya! Namaku Ollie dari Hololive Indonesia generasi kedua.
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! My name is Ollie from Hololive Indonesia second generation.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih telah datang ke Hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz Day 1.
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to Hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz Day 1.

subtitles.original: Dan aku Anya dari Hololive Indonesia generasi kedua.
subtitles.english: And I'm Anya from Hololive Indonesia second generation.

subtitles.original: Hari ini kami akan bertanggung jawab untuk membacakan pengumuman.
subtitles.english: Today we will be in charge of reading the announcements.

subtitles.original: Semoga hari ini akan jadi hari yang menyenangkan.
subtitles.english: We hope today will be a fun day.

subtitles.original: Halo semuanya! Namaku Reine dari Hololive Indonesia generasi kedua.
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! My name is Reine from Hololive Indonesia second generation.

subtitles.original: Pertama-tama, ada beberapa pengumuman untuk para tamu.
subtitles.english: First of all, there are some announcements for the guests.

subtitles.original: Kepada para tamu, kami mohon untuk selalu memakai masker saat berada di lobby maupun auditorium.
subtitles.english: To the guests, we ask you to always wear a mask while in the lobby or auditorium.
